languages.text: "Вы считаете, что более компетентны в оценке угроз, чем я и господин ван Калокс? Это любопытное суждение". {n}Лорд-инквизитор как-то по-особенному смотрит на вас... без выражения смотрит.{/n}
"You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы считаете, что более компетентны в оценке угроз, чем я и господин ван Калокс? Это любопытное суждение". {n}Лорд-инквизитор как-то по-особенному смотрит на вас... без выражения смотрит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}
"You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}
"You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}
"You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

languages.text: “你以为你比我和冯·卡洛克斯大师更懂得如何评估这种风险？真是个不同寻常的结论。”{n}大审判官打量着你，脸上没有任何表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你以为你比我和冯·卡洛克斯大师更懂得如何评估这种风险？真是个不同寻常的结论。”{n}审判长打量着你，脸上没有任何表情。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Se considera más capacitad{mf|o|a} para evaluar este riesgo que yo y que el maestro van Calox? Es una declaración curiosa». {n}El Lord Inquisidor te mira fijamente sin mostrar emoción alguna en su rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Se considera más capacitad{mf|o|a} para evaluar este riesgo que yo y que el maestro van Calox? Es una declaración curiosa». {n}El Lord Inquisidor te mira fijamente sin mostrar emoción alguna en su rostro.{/n}

languages.text: 「この私よりも、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスよりも、この危険性を評価できるほど有能だとうぬぼれているのか？面白い」{n}ロード・インクィジターが無表情であなたをじっと見据える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この私よりも、マスター・ヴァン・カロックスよりも、この危険性を評価できるほど有能だとうぬぼれているのか？面白い」{n}ロード・インクィジターが無表情であなたをじっと見据える。{/n}

languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr haltet Euch für fähiger, dieses Risiko einzuschätzen, als mich oder Meister van Calox? Eine merkwürdige Annahme." {n}Der Großinquisitor mustert dich, wobei sein Gesicht völlig ausdruckslos bleibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr haltet Euch für fähiger, dieses Risiko einzuschätzen, als mich oder Meister van Calox? Eine merkwürdige Annahme." {n}Der Großinquisitor mustert dich, wobei sein Gesicht völlig ausdruckslos bleibt.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous pensez donc être plus à même d'évaluer ces risques que maître van Calox ou moi-même ? Voilà qui est curieux. » {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur vous jauge du regard sans pour autant laisser transparaître la moindre émotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez donc être plus à même d'évaluer ces risques que maître van Calox ou moi-même ? Voilà qui est curieux. » {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur vous jauge du regard sans pour autant laisser transparaître la moindre émotion.{/n}

languages.text: "Risk değerlendirmesini yapmak konusunda kendini benden veya Üstat van Calox'tan daha mı yetkin görüyorsun? İlginç bir değerlendirme." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, kesinlikle ifadesiz bakışlarıyla seni baştan aşağı süzüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You consider yourself more competent to assess this risk than myself or Master van Calox? A curious assertion." {n}The Lord Inquisitor levels you with a look, his face utterly expressionless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Risk değerlendirmesini yapmak konusunda kendini benden veya Üstat van Calox'tan daha mı yetkin görüyorsun? İlginç bir değerlendirme." {n}Lord Engizisyoncu kesinlikle ifadesiz bakışlarıyla seni baştan aşağı süzüyor.{/n}
